arts.ttl: 'Convinced': Daniel Farke makes huge Leeds United promotion claim that will get Burnley fans talking
arts.sum: Daniel Farke has boldly claimed he is “100 per cent convinced” his Leeds United side will be playing in the Premier League next season despite their recent wobble.

arts.ttl: 25 photos of Burnley fans inside Turf Moor before 1-0 victory over Bristol City
arts.sum: Burnley fans were treated to a stunning free-kick from Zian Flemming as the Clarets moved level on points with second placed Leeds United after a 1-0 victory over Bristol City.

arts.ttl: Burnley loanee grabs second goal of the season as Standard Liege draw with KV Mechelen
arts.sum: Standard Liege’s on loan forward Andréas Hountondji put in his best performance for the side since joining on loan from Burnley in the winter window. The Benin international scored his…

arts.ttl: Burnley 1 - 0 Bristol City live: Zian Flemming gives Clarets early first-half lead over Robins - Bristol Live
arts.sum: The Reds were last in action 15 days ago when they welcomed Norwich City to Ashton Gate, with an impressive 2-1 win ensuring Liam Manning's side headed into the break level on points with the play-off places. Hello and welcome to this afternoon's live blog as Bristol City return from the March international break with a trip to Turf Moor to face Burnley.

arts.ttl: Scott Parker pinpoints one thing that surprised him about Burnley's one-sided win against Bristol City
arts.sum: Scott Parker admits he was a little bit surprised by how many chances Burnley were able to create during their one-sided victory against Bristol City.

arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings vs Burnley as Robins slip to 1-0 defeat at Turf Moor
arts.sum: Managed to save his own blushes when he quickly clawed the ball away from danger after failing to keep hold of Marcus Edwards' second-half shot. As the game wore on he was forced deeper and deeper and that limited his involvement in an attacking sense, especially in the second half.

arts.ttl: Leeds’ Championship title chances dented by late equaliser and Burnley close the gap
arts.sum: Swansea snatched a last-gasp equaliser to stop Leeds returning to the top of the Championship table, while third-placed Burnley kept up the pressure with a narrow win

arts.ttl: Burnley player ratings vs Bristol City as two 8/10s handed out following one-sided win - gallery
arts.sum: Despite only winning 1-0, Burnley produced a dominant display to see off Bristol City in their fight for Championship promotion.

arts.ttl: Flemming free-kick sees Burnley maintain promotion pace
arts.sum: Zian Flemming's stunning first-half free-kick boosted Burnley's bid for a quick return to the Premier League as Scott Parker's side maintained their unbeaten home record in a 1-0 win over play-off hopefuls Bristol City.

arts.ttl: Zian Flemming free-kick maintains Burnley’s promotion push
arts.sum: Victory over Bristol City took Burnley level on points with second-placed Leeds.
